title: Lvl 6 account can't board post
body: I'm level 6 but I am a level 1 boards profile, can't post, can't up vote, can't anything.

replies.body:
Your Boards and Summoner profiles should sync after you post, but it seems this didn't happen. I went ahead and manually requested a sync, so it should update here in a bit. For most of the board's discussion areas, you need to be level 7. The only exception is here in Help & Support, as we don't want to prevent players from getting technical assistance.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Hi . I am sorry about my comments during the games , but why you stopped my account from playing ? :) Can you just stopped my chat and let me play i am promise that i am not going to say bad things to the players .

Hey Cek3, 

We can't address account-specific questions related to restrictions or suspensions on the boards, as much of that information is sensitive. If you'd like to inquire about this further, I recommend [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with our specialists. They'll be able to better address these types of questions.
